channel.title: Minutes on WWU Cybersecurity Club
channel.description: Recent content in Minutes on WWU Cybersecurity Club

item.description: Date: October 8th 2021 Topic: Security Best Practices Slides available here 4:00pm: Did intro stuff and gave overview for todays meeting. 4:05pm: Went over different password managers. 4:10pm: Went over authenticators and different VPN provides (Self hosted vs Paid). 4:15pm: Asked class what some security best practices are and wrote them on whiteboard. 4:20pm: Did a kahoot on what we covered over the meeting so far. 4:55pm: Meeting over.

Date: October 1st 2021 Slides available here 4:00pm: Introduced club and talked about what we’re doing today 4:05pm: Talked about linktree that contains links to everything and the club format 4:10pm: Went over weekly club format and how we can have one meeting with pizza 4:15pm: Went over events to be aware of with the cybersecurity competitions, security awareness competition, and the ACM resume book. 4:20pm: Did officer introductions then let everyone introduce themselves for the next 15 minutes.
